column1: Due to COVID-19 the NPRC has had to reduce services that provide veterans with records needed to qualify for benefits. Many veterans have been waiting for months to receive records.   So I sent a letter calling on the NRPC to immediately fix this issue ➡️https://t.co/O7VdSPC2Y4

Small businesses are still struggling due to the coronavirus pandemic.   Unfortunately it has been 100+ days and House Dems are still holding $138B in unused #PPP funds hostage. It's time to put partisan politics aside and do what is best for our country. #LetsWork https://t.co/8ErkGALYVS

This morning I spoke on the House floor on #OperationWarpSpeed. Just this week Moderna announced COVID-19 vaccine success. I am grateful that we are closer to defeating this virus returning to our way of life and restoring our economy. https://t.co/afIGqUIn83
This is great news! Thank you @realDonaldTrump for #OperationWarpSpeed which is bringing us closer to defeating the coronavirus every day. https://t.co/Xx19PKCBIn
Free coronavirus testing in Barnwell November 9-13. Find more details below ➡️ https://t.co/WmXfvxOayF

Thank you to @scdhec for hosting today's meeting with @CDCgov Director Dr. Redfield in Columbia. Grateful to be a part of this discussion with our national and state leaders and to discuss the current and future impacts of COVID-19 on the public health of our communities. https://t.co/kdPfV10ih1

The September Jobs Report was the fifth month in a row of unemployment decline since the start of the coronavirus pandemic and 661000 jobs were added. I am grateful for this continued recovery. https://t.co/6FJtHuaXNv

Grateful to lead this letter in support of our SC teachers. We already know that COVID-19 has caused a disruption in student learning and instead of using valuable time to reaffirm that fact with a test we should be using that time to address student needs through instruction. https://t.co/r1BSTskYbh

This morning I stopped by the drive-thru coronavirus testing site at Brookland United Methodist Church. Thank you to the hard-working men and women of @scdhec and Lexington Medical Center for providing and administering these free tests. https://t.co/0n0EpMQHN9

A new @SelectGOP report shows that #PPP has supported over 51 million American jobs during the coronavirus pandemic.  I am grateful to have supported this critical program that has helped our small businesses maintain jobs during these challenging times. https://t.co/nAEO8KpYtM

Bronze Star LLC in Barnwell has worked to produce hand sanitizer in this time of need.  It is more important now than ever to keep your hands sanitized to avoid the spread of coronavirus thank you to Bronze Star for this effort to keep our country healthy and safe! #SC02BusTour https://t.co/3T1fz32gQF

This morning I met with @uwaiken as part of the #SC02BusTour. Sharon Rodgers President of Aiken United Way gave me an update on their coronavirus initiatives.   I am so grateful to Aiken United Way for everything they have done to help our community during these uncertain times. https://t.co/SWjK6eKOAR

Great stopping by @USCAiken today as part of the 2020 #SC02BusTour. I spoke with Chancellor Jordan about their approach to keeping students and faculty safe in response to the coronavirus pandemic and learned about their impressive new cybersecurity programs. https://t.co/iCJ7juFdXK

I always look forward to the Annual Bus Tour of South Carolina’s Second District. This year we have faced unprecedented times so I will be visiting businesses and organizations in #SC02 that have truly made a difference during the coronavirus pandemic.

It is great to see our community come together during these uncertain times. Thank you to the men and women of @fortjackson who volunteered at local coronavirus testing sites to help keep our community healthy and safe. https://t.co/C1d0Zd4ZeS

During these uncertain times it is inspiring to see our communities come together to help one another.   This morning I spoke on the House floor to thank @Zverse3D in Columbia for using all of their resources to meet the need to shield healthcare workers fighting coronavirus. https://t.co/kwUk27vtH6

There is evidence that China sent state-sponsored hackers to target our coronavirus vaccine research.   I introduced the @RepublicanStudy Nat'l Security Strategy which recommends how to counter China’s theft of our IP & trade secrets & the toughest sanctions on the CCP in history https://t.co/wo3y8MxK63
Free COVID-19 testing in Barnwell County this Friday. Find more details here ➡️  https://t.co/oMfxkdrHMn
It is important to stay informed about the coronavirus to keep you and your family safe. Find answers about the coronavirus from @CDCgov here ➡️ https://t.co/SYUm7rlXOn

Over 105000 South Carolinians rejoined the workforce since last month’s release. This means we now have over 2222000 South Carolinians working.   It's great to see this continued improvement as our state works to fully recover from the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/qD63GEE8Pd
The application deadline for #PPP has been extended until August 8. Find more information and apply here ➡️ https://t.co/y0Vkn8IGaN…/coronavir…/paycheck-protection-program https://t.co/Fwk9B9TWFJ

America has faced incredible challenges since March. As we continue to recover from the coronavirus pandemic I am grateful to see extraordinary job growth in the United States.  Read my op-ed on this in @TheNewIrmoNews ➡️ https://t.co/GjOXnnBxnN
I support extending the Paycheck Protection Program. #PPP has been widely successful and is helping our small businesses recover from the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/cLFNT5my3F
Today @scdhec has COVID-19 mobile testing clinics in #SC02. https://t.co/1t3OfEJG1V

Do the requirements and benefits provided for in the Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA) apply to you?  This tool from the @USDOL will quickly walk you through a few options to determine your eligibility as an employee.   Try it out here ➡️ https://t.co/fdpIqObpud
For updates on my work in Congress federal and state resources and the coronavirus subscribe to my newsletter here ➡️ https://t.co/AwKJhVMJDC

As our communities work to recover from the coronavirus pandemic and we continue to carefully reopen our country it is important to remember the lives lost from this terrible disease.   Read more in my op-ed in @TheNewIrmoNews ➡️ https://t.co/i9D2gEzjjF

I am grateful for the 2.5 million jobs added to our economy in May marking the beginning of our economic recovery from the coronavirus pandemic.   I am confident that @realDonaldTrump will continue working for jobs. https://t.co/p8MWz6FLAn

This week I introduced a bill to provide additional relief to Minor League Baseball teams like our  @GreenJackets and @ColaFireflies who are currently struggling due to the coronavirus.   I am grateful that this bill will help the teams that bring America’s Past Time to #SC02.

I introduced a House resolution calling for a nat'l day of mourning for the lives taken by coronavirus. Combatting the coronavirus has been the ultimate battle for many Americans. Their lives & achievements will not be forgotten. Read my full statement ➡️  https://t.co/0YxCUYS4wQ

I voted in favor of the Paycheck Protection Flexibility Act. Allowing flexibility to those who have been approved for these loans will make it easier for our small businesses to address the challenges faced due to the coronavirus. Read my statement here ➡️ https://t.co/1yck3Tb6Uu

Today I spoke on the House Floor thanking @SCHealthSPV for donating the 10K masks I distributed to #SC02. I am grateful for all public-private partnerships working to help our communities recover from the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/y4dr02VDfU

.@scdhec has mobile COVID-19 testing sites in Orangeburg Lexington and Richland counties along with many other counties all over South Carolina. To find a testing facility near you visit their website here ➡️ https://t.co/raczB8Wtr4
I am grateful to President Donald J. Trump for his response to the coronavirus pandemic and everything he is doing to help South Carolina recover. https://t.co/fn5JNbppxW

This month the SC National Guard was delivered technology that has the capability to decontaminate 80K masks daily.   I am grateful for this new development as our community continues to combat the coronavirus. Read more from @postandcourier here ➡️ https://t.co/cjlioUlyn2

I voted against H.R. 6800 the $3 trillion dollar wish list put forward by House Dems. Now is the time for us to work together to help our families recover from the coronavirus pandemic it is not the time for partisan politics. Read my full statement ➡️ https://t.co/T8bPZIyPYS

I want to make sure that you and your family are safe from scams during the coronavirus pandemic. Visit @TheJusticeDept website for more information on how to detect scams and other types of coronavirus fraud ➡️ https://t.co/lj6tmjJbwM

.@scdhec is partnering with community organizations to host free coronavirus mobile and popup testing clinics across South Carolina. Find additional information and locations here ➡️ https://t.co/OA6G8iGYrr

#AccelerateSC now has a one-stop website for coronavirus updates and resources specifically for South Carolinians.   This site is continually updated to help our community find important information during these uncertain times. https://t.co/jh6gHhIpDH

Tomorrow the American @RedCross is holding a blood drive in downtown Aiken to help address the urgent need for donations during the coronavirus pandemic.  Find more details from the @aikenstandard here ➡️ https://t.co/9mfbto8pvE

Tomorrow @iHeartRadio & @SBAgov are hosting a free webinar on the CARES Act & coronavirus small business relief.  Senior officials from the SBA will provide an overview on topics including #PPP & SBA Debt Relief. Register here ➡️ https://t.co/erOZ2V7P2m

Governor @henrymcmaster proclaimed today a day of prayer in South Carolina. My and Roxanne's prayers are with those who have lost loved ones our frontline workers and our entire community as we all work to recover from the coronavirus pandemic.

Our NATO ally Turkey sent two planes full of medical supplies to the US to he help combat the coronavirus.  As CoChair of the Caucus on US-Turkey Relations and Turkish Americans we thank Turkey for their generosity.

I am grateful to support the Paycheck Protection Program & Health Care Enhancement Act that @realDonaldTrump has signed into law. The #PPP supports American workers and small businesses affected by the coronavirus. Lending will resume this Monday April 27 at 10:30am EST. https://t.co/SmzDRMcbgL

Our children's hospitals and the heroic men & women who care for these sick children deserve support in these uncertain times. Today I joined this letter to House leadership urging funds for these hospitals be included in the next coronavirus package ➡️ https://t.co/RMO70U4ReT

.@realDonaldTrump is absolutely right to hold U.S. aid to the WHO after the organization spent the last six months parroting Chinese propaganda & covering up critical data about coronavirus transmission. Read my full statement ➡️ https://t.co/BfYEHxmczP

Grateful to meet with General James C. McConville U.S. Army Chief of Staff & Brigadier General Milford Beagle Jr. Commanding General U.S. Army Training Center & Fort Jackson at Fort Jackson today to discuss the Army’s important response efforts to the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/BfV8Ie45Hi

China’s efforts to conceal the origin of coronavirus can not be tolerated it is important that China immediately close live wildlife markets. These markets have exposed the people of China to life-threatening diseases putting their citizens & families across the world at risk. https://t.co/Ip5RsObCW7
Find the newest information on the CDC's coronavirus response here ➡️ https://t.co/VEblMQoXvg
Yesterday Governor @henrymcmaster announced that  furloughed workers qualify for unemployment benefits during the coronavirus pandemic. Read more from @postandcourier ➡️  https://t.co/tUt0lbNkdd

South Carolina's stay-at-home order goes into effect today at 5pm. It's important to stay home besides essential trips for groceries medicine or a medical emergency in order to stop the spread of coronavirus. Read more from @postandcourier ➡️  https://t.co/hOo5NmPPNA

Today is #WorldHealthDay. Roxanne and I are grateful for the medical professionals who are bravely working on the frontlines around the clock to save lives in the fight against coronavirus. https://t.co/Un53D2DcC5

Today I joined my House colleagues to send a letter to Secretary of Defense Mark Esper to ensure our military families are not unduly financially burdened during the coronavirus pandemic. Read the full letter here ➡️ https://t.co/jaSz5Un1N2

I am grateful for our Country's veterans and to represent the veterans of South Carolina's Second District. If you are a veteran in need of support because of the coronavirus pandemic visit the @DeptVetAffairs FAQ page ➡️ https://t.co/dwByfCNjiJ
Small businesses in need of support during the coronavirus pandemic can now apply for the Paycheck Protection Program. Find more information on  @USTreasury's website ➡️ https://t.co/Jqn0vkpqwm
If you own or work for a small business affected by the coronavirus pandemic visit my website for information on support for small businesses ➡️ https://t.co/g4RROgowdf

Today Governor @henrymcmaster announced an Executive Order to close non-essential businesses in South Carolina. So far South Carolinians have made great progress in social distancing but we must take further precautions to stop the spread of the coronavirus.
If you have questions about unemployment during the coronavirus pandemic visit the SC Department of Employment and Workforce's FAQ page ➡️ https://t.co/78V1rjwVn8
Read my op-ed in the @twincitynewsBL on continuing the fight against coronavirus ➡️  https://t.co/lKxlivlzHe

During a time when our nation is facing an unprecedented crisis I am grateful to join President Donald Trump in supporting the CARES Act to provide American families recovery from the coronavirus. Read my full statement ➡️ https://t.co/4cDjpk0kD0

Today I spoke on the House Floor in favor of the CARES Act. I am grateful to stand by President Trump in support of this Act to help American families recover from the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/My3M2aFI98

Today I sent a letter to Secretary of Defense Mark Esper to ensure that our defense industrial base is protected during the coronavirus pandemic. Read the full text of the letter here ➡️ https://t.co/9SHdAgxLFB

It's important to make sure you and your family are safe from scams during the COVID-19 outbreak. Visit the Justice Department's website for more information on how to detect fraud ➡️ https://t.co/oOlPhqe1St
Help stop the spread of COVID-19 ➡️ https://t.co/TOpRmtJVug

In response to COVID-19 @IRSNew is delaying tax payments for many taxpayers until July 15 without penalties or interest. File a return or request a filing extension by April 15. There is no additional filing necessary for the payment extension. https://t.co/R6OV5gOkXR
It is my priority to keep our community safe and healthy. My website is constantly updated to ensure you have the most updated information and best resources on COVID-19 ➡️ https://t.co/MtBTgRnzP5
I encourage all veterans concerned about the coronavirus to visit the @DeptVetAffairs website ➡️ https://t.co/E85MAySENO

The Aiken County Public School District will begin nutrition service today and distance learning Thursday for its students on hiatus because of the coronavirus pandemic. Read more from @aikenstandard ➡️   https://t.co/cBBWP4g1wV

Today I joined my colleagues from South Carolina in sending a letter to House Leadership urging them to make sure small businesses are not negatively impacted by the recently passed coronavirus bill. Read the full letter here ➡️ https://t.co/TtpYZ1faZ0
Thank you for having me on today! I encourage all concerned South Carolinians to consult this free resource on #COVID19. https://t.co/PccLDx9YBS

I am so grateful to @VP for his leadership in the fight against the Coronavirus and for focusing on keeping American families healthy and safe. Today’s talk with @VP and Dr. Fauci was very informative as we look to pass the funding needed to address #COVID19. https://t.co/8KrSchdlrq
